Container.Name: tvheadendsyno-Unstable
Container.Overview: This is the latest unstable branch of Tvheadend installed from the Tvheadend apt-repository. Tvheadend is a TV streaming server for Linux supporting DVB-S, DVB-S2, DVB-C, DVB-T, ATSC, IPTV, SAT>IP and HDHomeRun as input sources.
Container.Description: Tvheadend is a TV streaming server for Linux supporting DVB-S, DVB-S2, DVB-C, DVB-T, ATSC, IPTV. [br] http://tvheadend.org[br] [b][span style=\'color: #E80000;\']Directions:[/span][/b][br] [b]/config[/b] : This is where Tvheadend will store it\'s databases and configuration.[br][br] [b]/recordings[/b] : This is where Tvheadend will store it\'s recordings. You will have to edit the path in the configuration tab to /recordings or else the volume mapping will not work.[br][br] [b]/data[/b] : This is where the tv_grab_wg script will look for the guide.xml.[br][br]
